buraco.title: Game rules Buraco
buraco.description:
Descriptions

The game is played with 4 participants, forming duos, sitting in alternate positions on the table.

  • Players - 4
  • Deck of Cards - two traditional 52 cards deck
  • Distribution - 11 cards for each participant and 2 extra hands
  • Objective - Score more than the opponents

tranca.title: Game rules Tranca
tranca.description:
Descriptions

The game is played with 4 participants, forming duos, sitting in alternate positions on the table.

  • Players - 4.
  • Decks - two 52 cards pack.
  • Distribution - eleven cards each participant and two 11 cards extra piles.
  • Objective - Score more points.

truco.title: Game rules Truco
truco.description:
Descriptions

The game is played with 4 participants, forming duos, sitting in alternate positions on the table.

  • Players - 4.
  • Deck of Cards - a traditional (or spanish) pack, without Jokers, 8's, 9's or 10's.
  • Distribution - 3 cards each participant.
  • Objective - score 12 points.
